definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="item_istool"><field name="tool_type">Axe</field><comment type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Checks if block right clicked by the player is log (you can change it to whatever you want)</comment><value name="a"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:RedstoLog</field></block></value><value name="b"><block
